tool_description: Validates maintenance schedules and work orders against regulatory requirements, safety standards, and company policies.

schedule_id.description: Schedule ID to validate for compliance

vehicle_types.description: Types of vehicles in the schedule for appropriate regulation application

strict_mode.description: Whether to apply strict compliance checking

error_messages: Schedule not found: The provided schedule_id does not exist.
Invalid regulation standard: Use recognized standards like DOT, OSHA, FMCSA, EPA.
Unknown vehicle type: One or more vehicle_types are not recognized in the system.
Compliance data unavailable: Unable to access current regulatory requirements database.
usage: Provide schedule_id and vehicle_types, optionally specify regulation_standards and strict_mode. Returns compliance status and any violations found.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status: compliant, non_compliant, warning

violations_found.description: List of compliance violations or issues identified
